fields.name: The Caves of Treasure Island
fields.description: Rescue a captured adventurer from pirates on a volcanic island.
fields.full_description:
The Free Adventurer's Guild has elected you to rescue a captured adventurer.

Recently, somebody found a note in a bottle asking for assistance.  The author, Genzenbraun the Sailor, is a fellow member of the Guild. He explained that he had been taken captive by pirates on Treasure Island.

Unfortunatly the exact location of the unlucky adventurer was destroyed by sea water.  However, in the bottle was the following map...

Note: The original adventure included some custom graphics and sound elements designed for the Apple II and MS-DOS. These have not been ported to the web version (yet).
fields.intro_text:
Greetings, {{name}},

The Free Adventurer's Guild has elected you to rescue a captured adventurer. Recently, somebody found a note in a bottle asking for assistance. The author, Genzenbraun the Sailor, is a fellow member of the Guild.

He explained that he had been taken captive by pirates on Treasure Island. Unfortunatly the exact location of the unlucky adventurer was destroyed by sea water. However, in the bottle was the following map...

![Map of the island, showing the drop-off point on the west shore, a jungle in the west and south, a lake in the north, a volcano in the east, and a pick-up location on the south shore](/static/adventures/the-caves-of-treasure-island/treasure-island-map.jpg)

A word of caution:  Genzenbraun warns of hidden caverns with one way passages and tunnels under the surface of the island. Also, the waters around it are infested with man-eating sharks.

A ship will drop you off on the west beach of the island, but it has other duties and can't wait for you. Another is scheduled to land on the south beach soon after you are dropped off.

\*\*\*\* Good luck! \*\*\*\*

fields.name: You are in a bay.  (E)
fields.description: You have just gotten off the ship and watched it sail away.  You are now on your own. You are standing on a sand bar at the water's edge. To the east is a sandy beach. To the north, south, and west is ocean.

fields.name: You are on the west beach.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are on a sandy beach. To the west is a sand bar. Jagged volcanic rocks rise out of the sand to the north and south, too rugged to climb. To the east, the sand turns to grass, opening into a clearing. Farther to the east, looming over the island, is a cone-shaped volcano.

fields.name: You are in a pirate's lair!
fields.description: Oops!  You stumble in on a band of pirates.  One cuts off your arm from behind and the others close in quickly.  You are dead!

fields.name: You are on a north/south path.
fields.description: To north you can hear whispering (pirates?) and you can sense danger.  To the south is a path, to the west is ocean, and east there appears to be a pit of quicksand.

fields.name: You are at T-intersection; east by N/S.
fields.description: Here the path branches to the north and east.  To the west is the ocean and to the south is a large clearing.  There is a sign here.

fields.name: You are at a clearing. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a large, grassy clearing. You are surrounded by dense vegetation to the north, east, and south. To the west is a sandy beach. Trails lead in all directions.

fields.name: You are on a north/south path in a jungle.
fields.description: The path is overgrown with vegetation, making it hard going.  To the north is a large clearing, to the south the jungle (hopefully) seems to thin out, to the west is the ocean and to the east the vegetation is too thick to get through.

fields.name: You are in sharp bend.  (N/E)
fields.description: The path is pretty well worn here.  To the west and south is the bright blue ocean.  To the north the jungle seems to thicken somewhat.

fields.name: You are in a pit of quicksand!
fields.description: You have fallen in the quicksand!  You are slowly sinking under the surface!

fields.name: You are in a pit.  (S)
fields.description: You are at the bottom of a deep pit that appears to be the end of a lava tube.  The walls are very steep, making it is impossible to climb out.  The only opening is a dark tunnel to the south.

fields.name: You are on a well traveled path.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: To the west is a large clearing, to the north the path seems to thin out, to the south trees block your vision, and to the east you can make out a large volcano.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection; east by N/S.
fields.description: The vegetation is very thick here, and the jungle is impassable to the west.

fields.name: You are at a bend.  (N/W/D)
fields.description: The path turns sharply with exits to the north and west.  To the east is a bay.  A faded sign says, "Whalers cove".  You see a rope tied around a tree that goes down the cliff.

fields.name: You are by the hermit's hut.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are at a hermit's hut.  You see a patch of recently dug up ground.  To the north is ocean, south is a small lake, west you can see some quicksand, and the east path has a pile of leaves and sticks strewn across it.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection; south by E/W.
fields.description: As you reach the volcano, you see a cave to the east.  To the north is a small lake, and paths lies south and west.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection; north by E/W.
fields.description: The path seems to be well traveled.  To the south is a sandy bay.

fields.name: You are caught in a death trap!
fields.description: You have fallen into pit that was covered with branches.  It had sharp spikes at the bottom.  You were skewered!

fields.name: You are at a cave entrance.  (E/W)
fields.description: You have entered a cave in the side of the volcano.  The exit is west, and the cave continues to the east disappearing into darkness.

fields.name: You are on an east/west path in a jungle.
fields.description: The path winds through thick jungle.  You can push through to the east and west.  To the south is ocean and to the north is the steep side of a volcano which you can't climb.

fields.name: You are at the top of a down-slope.  (W/D)
fields.description: You are starting to have trouble seeing.  The only light comes from a red glow further down inside the volcano.  To the west is the cave opening and to the east is a steep down-slope.

fields.name: You are on the south beach.  (S/W)
fields.description: You are on a sandy beach.  Your ship is anchored to the south (hurray!), to the west is a very thick jungle, and north is the steep side of a volcano (which you still can't climb).

fields.name: You are on gangplank to your ship.  (N/S)
fields.description: You are on the gangplank of your ship.  You can go north, back to the beach, or go south to set sail for the Main Hall.

fields.name: You are in the kitchen.  (E)
fields.description: You are in a humble kitchen.  There are pots and pans spread all over the place and you see two large barrels.  One is split at the top and a foul smelling odor is coming from it.

fields.name: You are in the powder room.  (S/E)
fields.description: You are in a room that is loaded with barrels of gunpowder.  The tunnel turns sharply here, and exits are south and east.  There is a row of muskets along the wall.

fields.name: You are in the rest room.  (N/S)
fields.description: This seems to be your lucky day, the awful smell indicates that you just found the rest room!

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection; west by N/S.
fields.description: You are in a north/south corridor that branches to the west.  There is the smell of a very pungent food coming from someplace nearby (too bad, I was hungry).

fields.name: You are in the astronomy room.  (N/S)
fields.description: You are in a room with a bunch of celestial maps on the walls.  There are various tools laying around, such as sextants and compasses.

fields.name: You are in the west passage.  (N/E)
fields.description: You are in a dark passage.  The walls are rough, and floor is dirt.

fields.name: You are in the cannon room.  (S)
fields.description: You are in a room with two old cannons and a couple of piles of cannon balls.  The only exit is to the south.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection; north by E/W.
fields.description: You are in an empty room with nothing much of interest.

fields.name: You are in the north lava tube.  (N/S)
fields.description: You are in a circular passage that appears to be a lava tube.  It is very dark, with only a faint light from the north.

fields.name: You are in an east/west passage.
fields.description: You are in a dark passage.  The walls are rough and floor is made of dirt.  You can feel a breeze coming from the east.  The only light comes from one small torch on the wall.

fields.name: You are in large chamber.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: To the south you can see sunlight and smell salt in the air.  The room has many torches that are permanently attached to the walls.  To the east is a door that says, "KEEP OUT!"

fields.name: You are in the south lava tube.  (N/U)
fields.description: You are in a circular passage with smooth walls.  You can see a bay at the bottom of the cliff through an opening.  Outside the opening is a rope that is too short to climb down to the bay, but you can climb up it.

fields.name: You are in the west detention room.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are in an empty detention room with nothing much of interest.

fields.name: You are in the east detention room.  (E/W)
fields.description: There are some torches permanently attached to the wall, moderately lighting the room.  You see some chains hooked to the north wall.

fields.name: You are in an east/west corridor.
fields.description: You are in an empty corridor with nothing much of interest.

fields.name: You are in the dissection room.  (S/W)
fields.description: You are in a room with that has mutilated bodies scattered about the floor.  You can't make out what they were, but on a table is (gasp!) a partially mangled human body with a decomposing abdomen.

fields.name: You are at the bottom of a set of secret stairs.  (E)
fields.description: You found a flight of stairs leading into darkness (as in no light).  <No kidding? -FK>  As you start to descend, the door behind you slams shut and refuses to open.  You come to the bottom, a cold stone floor.  A dark doorway lies east.

fields.name: You are in Bluebeard's room.  (W)
fields.description: You have entered a lavishly decorated room.  The walls are adorned with gold plated skulls and you see a huge fancy waterbed.  In the center is a table with fresh meat and fruit.

fields.name: You are in a north/south corridor.
fields.description: There are glowing worms on the roof that provide quite a bit of light.  You step around a half-eaten animal carcass that is lying on the floor.

fields.name: You are in a dark hall.  (N/E/W)
fields.description: You hear faint human(?) screams coming from somewhere to the east.

fields.name: You are in the torture room.  (S)
fields.description: You are in a room with a rack, bed of nails, iron maiden, and other nasty devices that are intended to create excruciating pain (ouch!).

fields.name: You are in large chamber.  (N/E/W/D)
fields.description: This room it is brightly lit, partially by lanterns hung on the incredibly high ceiling and partially by an unseen source that radiates from the walls.  <Nuclear waste?  -FK>

fields.name: You are at the bottom of an up-slope.  (S/U)
fields.description: You are in a small passageway with a set of steps leading up.  There is a poem carved on the wall.

fields.name: You are in the prison.  (E)
fields.description: You are in what appears to be a detention room.  The walls are bare except for chains and you see a large bowl of stagnant water.  The door you just came through locked behind you and you can't get it open again.

fields.name: You are in the jewel room.  (W/S/U)
fields.description: You are in a room loaded with goodies.  There is lots of rare silk, jewels, and gold stacked on shelves.  On the north side is a steep dirt trail that leads up to a light source.  Doors lie south and west.  You notice a small hole in one wall.

fields.name: You are at the bottom of an up-slope.  (E/U)
fields.description: You are in a bare corridor that looks like a cave and smells like one too.  To the east is an opening, and there is a sharp slope leading up.

fields.name: You are at the bottom of an up-slope.
fields.description: The floor is hard and rocky here, the only exit is a steep slope leading up.

fields.name: You are in a large dirty room.  (N/W/E/D)
fields.description: East is a doorway with a sign that says, "Dare you go through?".  (Kinda makes you want go in, doesn't it?)

fields.name: You?are?in?the?mental?torture?room?
fields.description: You are in a large room with exits on all sides, a ladder going up, and a hole in the floor.  On the walls are weird, nerve wracking geometric shapes that seem to pulse and move.  Written in blood you see, "You'll never get out with your sanity!!"

fields.name: You are at the core of the volcano.  (N/S)
fields.description: You are in a dark, hot cavern.  You can't seem to climb back up through the hole, but there are exits to the north and south.

fields.name: You are at the top of a down-slope.  (N/D)
fields.description: You are at the top of a down-slope adjacent to the volcano.  To the north is a path, and the down-slope (of course) leads down to the ground.

fields.name: You are on the north beach, west side.  (S/E)
fields.description: You are on a sandy beach.  To the west is dense jungle (no passage), to the north is ocean, south is the entrance to the Pirates' caves, and east is more beach that you can continue to walk along.

fields.name: You are on the north beach, east side.  (S/W)
fields.description: You are on a sandy beach.  To the north is ocean, south is a path, west is more beach, and east is a high cliff.

fields.name: You are at the volcano entrance.  (N/S)
fields.description: You have just entered a cave in the side of the volcano.  The ground is rocky and there is a very hot wave of heat coming from the south.  To the north is the beach.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel in the volcano.
fields.description: The heat is very intense here, and growing hotter the farther south you go.  To the north is the opening.  (To the south...?)

fields.name: You are in a dragon's lair.  (N)
fields.description: You are in a large room in the center of the volcano.  The heat is unbearable.  There is a giant bathtub with faucets marked "Hot Lava" and "Burning Lava".

fields.name: animal carcass
fields.description: It is very gross and smelly, nearly causing you to vomit.

fields.name: potion
fields.description: You see a bottle containing a mysterious and unpredictable potion.

fields.name: shovel
fields.description: You see a small shovel with a steel blade and wooden handle lying in the bushes.

fields.name: silver chest
fields.description: You see an empty chest made out of mahogany and pure silver.

fields.name: silver skillet
fields.description: You see a medium sized skillet made out of 1/8 inch silver.

fields.name: telescope
fields.description: You see a high quality hand-made redwood telescope with precision ground lenses.

fields.name: gold cannonball
fields.description: You see a hollow golden cannonball on one of the piles of cannonballs.

fields.name: silk
fields.description: You see yards of sheer silk in various colors.

fields.name: dead rotting body
fields.description: You see the dead rotting body of someone who was left here to starve.  On his hat, embroidered in gold thread, is:  "ELP YEW KERI".

fields.name: doubloons
fields.description: You see a multitude of gold doubloons which were inside the chest.

fields.name: gold & silver chains
fields.description: You see some gold and silver chains that were used to chain up prisoners (what a way to go!)

fields.name: diamonds
fields.description: You see a pile of diamonds in the corner of the room.

fields.name: rubies
fields.description: You see a stack of rubies next to the pile of diamonds.

fields.name: sapphire
fields.description: You find a large ocean blue sapphire that was hidden in a hole in the wall.

fields.name: book
fields.description: You see an ordinary, plain, green book.  On the cover in gold leaf letters is the title, "Houdini the Escape Artist".

fields.name: White House key
fields.description: You find a gold plated, platinum filled, silver flashed replica of the key to the White House!  A tag on it says, "If lost send $14.95 to Key, BOX 17M, Denver, CO 80217 for replacement".

fields.name: Japanese chest
fields.description: You see a sturdy wooden chest, lacquered and gilded with elaborate Japanese designs. The lock has a reinforced shackle and would be hard to pry open.

fields.name: magic harp
fields.description: You see a beautiful magical harp.  ALL of the hundreds of strings seem to be out of tune on the stupid thing, however.

fields.name: sword
fields.description: You see a medium-quality Marcos sword.

fields.name: magic dagger
fields.description: You see a 6-inch dagger with jewels embedded in the handle and a magical glow.

fields.name: magic axe
fields.description: You see a normal hand axe with a mysterious magical glow.

fields.name: mace
fields.description: You see a normal mace that is in good condition.

fields.name: whip
fields.description: You see the whip that Brutus carried to torture people with.

fields.name: kitchen knife
fields.description: You see a yard-long serrated meat carving knife that can be used as a nasty weapon.

fields.name: bow
fields.description: You see a medium quality hardwood bow.

fields.name: spear
fields.description: You see a redwood spear with a sharpened point.

fields.name: spear#
fields.description: You see a purple wood spear with a metal arrowhead.

fields.name: axe
fields.description: You see a rather large but small axe.  ["Rather large but small"??  What the heck is that supposed to mean? -FK]

fields.name: sword#
fields.description: You see a high quality, stainless steel alloy sword.

fields.name: crossbow
fields.description: You see a top quality, high grained, ultra-powerful crossbow made of oak from the dangerous Carnivorous Forest in a remote part of Eamon.

fields.name: flute
fields.description: You see a flute that is made out of a mysterious material.

fields.name: bound man
fields.description: You see a poor innocent sailor that has been chained to the wall and is being unceremoniously whipped.

fields.name: chained man
fields.description: You see a man chained to the wall.  He wears the colors of a Free Adventurer.

fields.name: sign
fields.description: The sign says, "Beware of quicksand!" and has an arrow that points east.

fields.name: muskets
fields.description: They are very old and you can't use them to fight with, you can however make some nice cash if you sell them to Sam Slicker.

fields.name: tools
fields.description: You gather up the various astrological paraphernalia into a neat pile.

fields.name: cannons
fields.description: The cannons are pretty old, showing signs of much use.

fields.name: piles of cannon balls
fields.description: They look just like any other piles of cannon balls.

fields.name: sign
fields.description: It says, "BEWARE THE SPIRIT OF ETULF YALP!"

fields.name: torch
fields.description: You can make out the words, "Ever-Lite" on the handle.  <Thanks to Roger & Nathan -FK>

fields.name: chains
fields.description: You see nothing special about them.

fields.name: inscription
fields.description: It says, "From way back when in the days of old/Many stories have been told/Some warn of what is near/The spirit of ETULF YALP dwells here!"

fields.name: body
fields.description: The body smells awful and you elect to leave it alone.

fields.name: poem
fields.description: It says, "No key can help you through it, but enchanting music might just do it."

fields.name: bathtub
fields.description: You see the ridiculously huge bathtub with the faucets are marked, "Hot Lava" and "Burning Lava".

fields.name: gold plated skulls
fields.description: You remove the gold plated skulls from the walls.

fields.name: food
fields.description: You see a cold ham and some fried chicken legs, as well as various pineapples, tangerines, and mango.  (Yumm!)

fields.name: glowing worms
fields.description: They're kind of cute!

fields.name: locked door
fields.description: To the east is a locked door without a keyhole.  There is a sign on it.

fields.name: locked door#
fields.description: To the west is a locked door that has no keyhole.

fields.name: locked door##
fields.description: To the south is a locked door that has no keyhole.

fields.name: locked door###
fields.description: To the east you see locked door that has no keyhole.

fields.name: locked door####
fields.description: To the west is a locked door with an inscription carved on it.

fields.name: a secret trap door
fields.description: You found a secret trap door under the dirt.  It opens to a set of stairs that lead down into darkness.

fields.name: jug of vodka
fields.description: You see an empty plastic gallon jug which once contained "Five O-Clock Vodka", or so the label says.  Terry apparently filled it with sand, making a club-like weapon.

fields.name: pile of birch bark
fields.description: You see a large pile of birch bark that Terry the Pirate was carrying.  It is full of all kinds of mad writing and drawings, including a formula for lighting fires in the middle of a stream.

fields.name: garbage can
fields.description: You find the answer to the smell, this is the garbage can.

fields.text: You see Captain Hook fall down and gasp his final breath.  (Good news for Peter Pan!)
The hermit says he didn't dig up the ground here.
As soon as you read the first word, you find yourself being swiftly teleported through space and time.
As you reach for the doubloons, you hear a distant, bearded voice ring out:  "UNDEFINED STATEMENT LINE 1150!"
CONGRATULATIONS, YOU HAVE FOUND THE SECRET MESSAGE FOR THIS ADVENTURE!
When you return to the Main Hall, Genzenbraun immediately goes to see Shylock McFhenny and withdraws 1000 gold pieces which he gives to you for rescuing him.

fields.name: Consu
fields.description: You see a fat cannibal with "Consu" written on his loincloth.

fields.name: Magali
fields.description: You see a fatter cannibal with "Magali" written on his loincloth.

fields.name: One-Eye
fields.description: You see a pirate with a patch on one eye and what appears to be a flute in his hand.

fields.name: Hermit
fields.description: You take a closer look at your rescuer.  He is rather dirty but has a friendly face.

fields.name: Bluebeard
fields.description: You see a sleeping figure with a thick blue beard and an axe by his side.  He jumps up with a start and stands glaring at you.

fields.name: Captain Hook
fields.description: You see a pirate (obviously a Commander) with a hook for his left hand.

fields.name: Genzenbraun
fields.description: As you release the young man, he says "Are you from the Guild?  Many days has it been since I sent my message in a bottle!"  He then withdraws a mace from under a stone.  He says his name is Genzenbraun.

fields.name: Brutus
fields.description: You see a large man whipping a captured sailor with a rawhide whip.

fields.name: George
fields.description: The man thanks you for freeing him.  He says he was a deckhand on a ship that was captured by a one-handed pirate.

fields.name: Dragon
fields.description: You see a huge red dragon with tough scales and long teeth lounging in a bathtub that is filled with molten rock.  A crossbow rests on the towel rack.

fields.name: Lava Monster
fields.description: You see a red, dripping creature.  His arms are long and they flare up as he moves.  His natural defense system consists of him taking chunks of himself and throwing them at you.

fields.name: Wizard
fields.description: You see an old man with a pointed hat and a robe with celestial pictures on it.  He carries a magic dagger.  He is a prisoner here.

fields.name: Gunny
fields.description: You see a tall guard blocking you from going any further.  On his arm is a tattoo that says, "Gunny".  He carries a sword.

fields.name: Cooky
fields.description: You see a fat man in a white cap with flour on his nose.  As he sees you, he instantly grabs for the nearest weapon (a long carving knife).

fields.name: Maria
fields.description: You see an attractive girl. She says her name is Maria.

fields.name: Terry the Pirate
fields.description: You see a slim man of average height.  He is wearing a paper pirate hat and munching on a bag of Combos.  He says, "Ya-there, eh.  Whatcha doin'?"

fields.question: The Caves of Treasure Island -- Watch out!
The Caves of Treasure Island -- How do I escape the quicksand?
The Caves of Treasure Island -- Where can I find a source of light?
The Caves of Treasure Island -- How do I open the locked doors?
The Caves of Treasure Island -- What's the shovel/harp/potion for?
The Caves of Treasure Island -- Differences from original version.

fields.answer: Be careful not to go north of the room where you hear whispering, or east from the hermit's hut!
Just SAY HELP and you will be rescued.
EXAMINE the torch in the room that is described as having only one torch.
You must USE the magic flute (which is carried by One-Eye).

The magic harp will heal you if you USE it; the potion will do three random things (heal/hurt/nothing); and you can USE the shovel to dig stuff up.  Just try it in every room (you should find two different things).

Terry the Pirate was added by me (Frank Kunze), a joke on somebody I once knew.  I also 'cleaned up' a lot of the text and added ALL of the embedded artifacts, the dark rooms, and the ending text.  Oh, and I had to recreate graphics & sound myself.
